name: Inertianaut
description:
WARNING - Jumping into the wall you're attached on can (and probably will) get you perma-stuck.If this happens press R to restart! We noticed the bug too late to fix for submission. Sorry for any pain this causes.

A Platformer without Gravity. Made for GTMK 2018

Developers: @mikegbrown and @Browen_McIntosh 

Controls:

* supports keyboard and gamepad (Though it plays badly with analog sticks)

  • WASD/D-Pad - Crawl along walls and aim your leaps
  • Spacebar/A-button - Push-off/leap
  • R - Restart current level
  • Esc - Quit Game

Notes:

  • It is possible to destroy items you require to beat the level. Press R to restart if that happens
  • If you become stuck just try pushing off - if you get REALLY stuck press R to restart.
